name: LaundryCheck
0:
”Alexa, open check my laundry”
”Available machines?”
”Available washing machines?”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: check my laundry
des: Some college campuses are equipped with a laundry machine monitoring system provided by Mac-Gray Corp. Their website is laundryview.com and can be used to check on the number of washing/drying machines available in a given dorm laundry room. This skill adds this laundry monitoring functionality to Alexa. Ask alexa about the number of machines available. Not affiliated with Mac-Gray.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
